pkgmetadata.longdescription: Power Analysis for a SMART Design // A set of tools for determining the necessary sample size in order to identify the optimal dynamic treatment regime in a sequential, multiple assignment, randomized trial (SMART). Utilizes multiple comparisons with the best methodology to adjust for multiple comparisons. Designed for an arbitrary SMART design. Please see Artman (2018) 10.1093/biostatistics/kxy064 for more details. The basic functionality of this R package has been implemented in a Shiny app https://wilart.shinyapps.io/smartsizer-power- sample-size/.
